column1: Essential tremor is a type of involuntary shaking movementshaking movement in which no cause can be identified.
Essential tremor is the most common type of tremor.
Essential tremor affects men and women and is most common in people older than 65.
Some research suggests that the part of the brain that controls muscle movements does not work correctly in patients with essential tremor.
This means that you only need to get the gene from one parent to develop the tremor.
